bio: I am Malai'a, a female Khajiit from Scenchal, way down on the southern tip of Elsweyr. I grew up as sort of a street rat among the slums, dodging the law and stealing to survive. In my youth, my friend was killed in a cross-fire between the guards and a notorious skooma-dealer named Shazz’ra the Scourge. Since then, I’ve been burning for vengeance and a desire to end his drug empire. After completing “Sugar and Scurvy” with me, I will be available as a Master Pickpocket Trainer. I will travel with Risaad’s caravan, between Whiterun and Markarth.
name: Malai'a
notes: Anna VA, sounds very similar to Tikrid, so that model has been assigned
